### r2slides

[![Codecov test
coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/Adam-Hubbs/r2slides/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/Adam-Hubbs/r2slides)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/Adam-Hubbs/r2slides/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Adam-Hubbs/r2slides/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)

r2slides is a package designed to create and modify google slides
presentations in R. This website housed the current documentation
surrounding the functions. This package is currently in DEVELOPMENT and
syntax will change frequently.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`add1s()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/add1s.md)
  : Create a slide with title, commentary, and footer
- [`add_commentary()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/add_commentary.md)
  : Add commentary text to a Google Slide
- [`add_footer()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/add_footer.md)
  : Add a footer to a Google Slide
- [`add_linked_chart()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/add_linked_chart.md)
  : Add a linked Google Sheets chart to a Google Slides presentation
- [`add_text()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/add_text.md)
  : Add or update text in a Google Slides presentation
- [`add_title()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/add_title.md)
  : Add a title to a Google Slide
- [`correct_slide_size()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/correct_slide_size.md)
  : Correct slide sizes
- [`create_presentation_env_in_global()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/create_presentation_env_in_global.md)
  : Create presentation environment
- [`create_spreadsheet_env_in_global()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/create_spreadsheet_env_in_global.md)
  : Create spreadsheet environment
- [`get_chart_id()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/get_chart_id.md)
  : Get chart_id from a Google Sheet
- [`in_bottom_left()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/in_bottom_left.md)
  : Creates a slide_position object with defaults in the bottom left of
  the slide
- [`in_bottom_middle()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/in_bottom_middle.md)
  : Creates a slide_position object with defaults in the bottom middle
  of the slide
- [`in_bottom_right()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/in_bottom_right.md)
  : Creates a slide_position object with defaults in the bottom right of
  the slide
- [`in_top_left()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/in_top_left.md)
  : Creates a slide_position object with defaults in the top left of the
  slide
- [`in_top_middle()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/in_top_middle.md)
  : Creates a slide_position object with defaults in the top middle of
  the slide
- [`in_top_right()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/in_top_right.md)
  : Creates a slide_position object with defaults in the top right of
  the slide
- [`new_presentation()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/new_presentation.md)
  : Create a new Google Slides presentation
- [`new_slide()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/new_slide.md)
  : Create a new slide in a Google Slides presentation
- [`on_slide()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/on_slide.md)
  [`on_current_slide()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/on_slide.md)
  [`on_newest_slide()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/on_slide.md)
  [`on_slide_id()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/on_slide.md)
  [`on_slide_url()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/on_slide.md)
  : Specify a slide by ID or URL
- [`query2()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/query2.md)
  : Query Google API's
- [`r2slides_auth()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/r2slides_auth.md)
  : Create OAuth authentication token
- [`r2slides_deauth()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/r2slides_deauth.md)
  : Clear current token
- [`r2slides_token()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/r2slides_token.md)
  : Get authentication token
- [`register_presentation()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/register_presentation.md)
  : Register a Google Slides presentation
- [`set_defaults()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/set_defaults.md)
  : Set default style values
- [`write_gs()`](https://adam-hubbs.github.io/r2slides/reference/write_gs.md)
  : Writes data to a Google Sheet
